statements: UPDATE crowdfunding_campaigns SET contribution_amount = 500 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE crowdfunding_campaigns SET campaign_goal = 10000, campaign_end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE crowdfunding_campaigns SET campaign_goal = 10000, contribution_amount = 500 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE crowdfunding_campaigns SET contribution_amount = 750, campaign_start_date = '2022-09-01', contributor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE campaigns SET funds_raised = 5000 WHERE campaign_id = '2a8ce111-921b-4732-8ac1-4ff3998cca5b';
UPDATE contributors SET contributed_amount = 1000 WHERE contributor_id = '19b483f5-4f8b-426c-bab7-777ffab372cf';
UPDATE campaigns SET funds_raised = funds_raised + 1000 WHERE campaign_id = '62885a78-2b06-4bf5-9b91-1b5ae3f4f6a8';
UPDATE contributors SET contributed_amount = contributed_amount + 500 WHERE campaign_id = 'd2e3f1da-0f7d-4211-b521-65fc5c10aa17' AND contributor_id = '6a2f4e7b-3aa6-44ec-aa66-2b21ab076dc2';
UPDATE campaigns SET campaign_status='Active' WHERE campaign_id=1;
UPDATE contributors SET total_contribution=500.25 WHERE contributor_id=3;
UPDATE campaigns SET campaign_status = 'Active', campaign_goal = 15000 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE contributors SET total_contribution = 5000, contributor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE contributor_id = 3;
UPDATE campaigns SET current_amount = current_amount + 500 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE contributions SET amount = 1000 WHERE contribution_id = 3;
UPDATE campaigns SET current_amount = current_amount + 5000.50 WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE contributions SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE contribution_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE campaign SET title='Summer Campaign', goal_amount=50000 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE contributor SET total_contributions=20000, name='Alice Smith' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE campaign SET goal_amount = 5000.00, title = 'Summer Fundraiser', end_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE contribution SET amount = 100.00, contribution_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND contributor_id = 3;
